TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EasingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: から派生したクラスがイージングを実行するモードを定義します。

span.span: Defines the modes in which classes derived from perform their easing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次のグラフのさまざまな値を示すここで、 *f*(*t*)、アニメーションの進行状況を表すと*t*時間を表します。The following graphs demonstrate the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![BackEase EasingMode のグラフ。] (~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode のグラフ。")![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.") ![BounceEase EasingMode のグラフ。] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode のグラフ。")![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CircleEase EasingMode のグラフ。] (~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode のグラフ。")![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") ![CubicEase EasingMode のグラフ。] (~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode のグラフ。")![CubicEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode graphs.") ![異なる easingmode のグラフ ElasticEase します。] (~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase 異なる easingmode のグラフ。")![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![異なる easingmode の ExponentialEase のグラフ。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "異なる easingmode の ExponentialEase のグラフ。")![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.") ![異なる easingmode のグラフ QuarticEase します。] (~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase 異なる easingmode のグラフ。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![異なる easingmode のグラフ QuadraticEase](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase の異なる easingmode のグラフ")![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes") ![異なる easingmode のグラフ QuarticEase します。] (~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase 異なる easingmode のグラフ。")![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![異なる easingmode のグラフ QuinticEase します。] (~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase 異なる easingmode のグラフ。")![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.") ![異なる EasingMode 値の SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "異なる EasingMode 値の SineEase")![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values") ## XAML 属性の使用方法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseIn = int32(0)

summary.span: イージング関数に関連付けられている数式に従って補間します。

span.span: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseInOut = int32(2)

summary.span: アニメーションの前半は を、後半は を使用して補間します。

span.span: Interpolation uses for the first half of the animation and for the second half.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode EaseOut = int32(1)

summary.span: 100% の補間からイージング関数に関連付けられている数式の出力結果を差し引き、それに基づいて補間します。

span.span: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
